geekshop.model

Class GSInventoryItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.salespointframework.core.AbstractEntity<org.salespointframework.inventory.InventoryItemIdentifier>
      • org.salespointframework.inventory.InventoryItem
        • geekshop.model.GSInventoryItem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, org.springframework.data.domain.Persistable<org.salespointframework.inventory.InventoryItemIdentifier>

    @Entity
public class GSInventoryItem
extends org.salespointframework.inventory.InventoryItem
    An extension of InventoryItem extended by a minimal Quantity in stock which must not be undercut.
    Author:
    Sebastian DÃ¶ring

      • GSInventoryItem

        public GSInventoryItem(org.salespointframework.catalog.Product product,
                       org.salespointframework.quantity.Quantity quantity,
                       org.salespointframework.quantity.Quantity minimalQuantity)
        Creates a new GSInventoryItem for the given product and quantity. Furthermore a minimal Quantity is required which must not be undercut in stock.
        Parameters:
        minimalQuantity - must not be null or negative.
